entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH HIGHS AROUND 50
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

RAIN SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT
